snippet: World number one Andy Murray started his new season with a surprise 7-6(4) 6-4 loss to David Goffin in the semi-finals of the Mubadala World Tennis Championship in Abu Dhabi on Friday....
lead_paragraph: World number one Andy Murray started his new season with a surprise 7-6(4) 6-4 loss to David Goffin in the semi-finals of the Mubadala World Tennis Championship in Abu Dhabi on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Murray Loses Season Opener to Goffin in Abu Dhabi
headline.main: Murray Loses Season Opener to Goffin in Abu Dhabi
